channel.title: Bryan R Scott on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Bryan R Scott on My New Hugo Site

item.title: About
item.description: Illustration from Victor Hugo et son temps (1881) My research is in data-driven astrophysics and cosmology. This means I’m somewhere between being an astronomer and a physicist, somewhere between a theorist, observer and statistician. I also teach data science to astronomy PhD students as part of the Rubin Observatory Data Science Fellowship Program. Over the last century, we have discovered that the universe consists primarily of baryons (or “normal” matter), dark matter, and dark energy.

item.title: Contact
item.description: This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
